title: Over 1.1M layoffs planned for this year — the highest level since 2020 pandemic
description: Layoff announcements totaled 71,321 in November, a decline from October’s more than 153,000 cuts, according to consulting firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas.
content:
US employers have announced more than 1.1 million layoffs so far this year the most since the COVID pandemic hit in 2020, consulting firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas said in a report Thursday.
